PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-01071999-01-250,  LAB,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of JEAN GALIPEAULT, of Montreal, Quebec, as a Vice-Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years; and order that JEAN GALIPEAULT be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act, effective February 1, 1999.
Attachments
